database.name: VIEW ETBI_IE_CONFIGURATIONS
database.view: SELECT con.searchkey, con.type, COALESCE(conline.doctype, conline.m_product_category_id, conline.m_product_id, conline.c_glitem_id) AS record_id, conline.number, conline.string, conline.yesno FROM etbi_ie_configuration con JOIN etbi_ie_configuration_line conline ON con.etbi_ie_configuration_id = conline.etbi_ie_configuration_id
